page.title: 09WORK IN OUR PARISH
page.content: There are{not many jobs}in our Parish.The{main one is farming,}sheep farming for one. My father is a sheep and cattle farmer too. John O'Neill is a sheep farmer and two of his sons,Liam and Seamus.Seamus also farms cows as well.John Paul Donnelly farms sheep and Dairy cows. Arthur Mulholland is a sheep farmer and has two milk cows.Denis O'Loan is another who has sheep and a milking cow or two.Anthony O'Neill is the{big sheep {farmer}around here.He is supposed to have{1.000 sheep}and thats not counting the lambs.Laurence O'Neill his brother deals in pencils,rubbers, sharpeners,crayons,felttips. You name it.He has it. On the other side of the road is Francis McCormick .He farms sheep and cows.He farms cows and lets a bull run with them.
